CustomField.description: Each field mapping can be part of many processes as long as the process from and to object are the same. Each process must be separated by a carriage return. For a list of processes please see the Case Process Mapping custom metadata type
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Each field mapping can be part of many processes as long as the process from and to object are the same. Each process must be separated by a carriage return. For a list of processes please see the Case Process Mapping custom metadata type
CustomField.label: Processes
